titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, August 1956

mods.tableOfContents: Cheyenne Hymn - Students of Lillian Levi. Cheyenne Story - Conrad Hurd, student of Roger Whiteturtle. Comanche Hymn - Cynthia Ware. Cheyenne Hymn by Laura Bighorse. Kiowa talk by Mose Poolaw, Miss Gibson. Kiowa Song by Mose Poolaw. Arapaho Hymn. Announcements. Comanche Hymn by students of Cynthia Ware. Cheyenne Hymn by Cheyenne Group. Comment by William Wolfe. Comanche Hymn by Conrad Haury. Kiowa-Comanche Hymn by Mose Poolaw. Kiowa Hymn (2). Comments.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
